citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_2e301ee1-6724-4978-82a9-ad52fc26045a\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"The University of Victoria, Institute for Integrated Energy Systems (PRIMED)\"}, {\"given\": \"Brad\", \"family\": \"Buckham\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"04\", \"01\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la temp\u00e9rature de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bou\u00e9es \u00e0 vagues instrument\u00e9es situ\u00e9es au large de la c\u00f4te ouest de l'\u00eele de Vancouver. Cet ensemble de donn\u00e9es comprend les types de variables suivants\u00a0: param\u00e8tres des vagues (comme la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres d'ondes et coefficients de Fourier, s\u00e9ries chronologiques d'altitude de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, temp\u00e9rature de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface.\nLe Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Universit\u00e9 de Victoria. Gr\u00e2ce \u00e0 la collaboration avec l'industrie et les collectivit\u00e9s c\u00f4ti\u00e8res, PRIMED appuie le d\u00e9veloppement responsable de l'\u00e9nergie marine renouvelable en Colombie-Britannique.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Donn\u00e9es de la bou\u00e9e \u00e0 vagues PRIMED\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_2e301ee1-6724-4978-82a9-ad52fc26045a?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_2e301ee1-6724-4978-82a9-ad52fc26045a\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"The University of Victoria, Institute for Integrated Energy Systems (PRIMED)\"}, {\"given\": \"Brad\", \"family\": \"Buckham\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"04\", \"01\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents.\nThe Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria.  Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"PRIMED wave buoy data\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_2e301ee1-6724-4978-82a9-ad52fc26045a?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents.
The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria.  Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la température de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bouées à vagues instrumentées situées au large de la côte ouest de l'île de Vancouver. Cet ensemble de données comprend les types de variables suivants : paramètres des vagues (comme la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres d'ondes et coefficients de Fourier, séries chronologiques d'altitude de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, température de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface.
Le Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Université de Victoria. Grâce à la collaboration avec l'industrie et les collectivités côtières, PRIMED appuie le développement responsable de l'énergie marine renouvelable en Colombie-Britannique.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:credit>
        <gco:CharacterString></gco:CharacterString>
      </mri:credit>

        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelists/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="onGoing"></mcc:MD_ProgressCode>
      </mri:status>

      </mri:topicCategory>

          <mri:keyword xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">

name: ca-cioos_2e301ee1-6724-4978-82a9-ad52fc26045a
notes:
Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents.
The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria.  Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.

notes_translated.en:
Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents.
The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria.  Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.
notes_translated.fr:
Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la température de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bouées à vagues instrumentées situées au large de la côte ouest de l'île de Vancouver. Cet ensemble de données comprend les types de variables suivants : paramètres des vagues (comme la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres d'ondes et coefficients de Fourier, séries chronologiques d'altitude de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, température de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface.
Le Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Université de Victoria. Grâce à la collaboration avec l'industrie et les collectivités côtières, PRIMED appuie le développement responsable de l'énergie marine renouvelable en Colombie-Britannique.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.
